text: Boys' Night Out is a 1962 American romantic comedy movie directed by Michael Gordon and starring Kim Novak, James Garner, Tony Randall, Howard Duff, Janet Blair, Patti Page, Zsa Zsa Gabor, William Bendix, Howard Morris. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. == References == ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1962 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American sex comedy movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies directed by Michael Gordon
title: Boys' Night Out (movie)
